sentences.sContent: But even your dreams will be but a pale shadow of my true decadence.
sentences.sContent_eng: But even your dreams will be but a pale shadow of my true decadence.
sentences.sCn: 但你的梦不过是我真实衰落中一个苍白的影子罢了。

sentences.sContent: America is the only country that went from barbarism to decadence without civilization in between.
sentences.sContent_eng: America is the only country that went from barbarism to decadence without civilization in between.
sentences.sCn: 美国是唯一一个直接从野蛮进入颓废、中间没有经过文明阶段的社会。

sentences.sContent: America a is the only country that went from barbarism to decadence without civilization in between.
sentences.sContent_eng: America a is the only country that went from barbarism to decadence without civilization in between.
sentences.sCn: 美国是唯一一个直接从野蛮进入颓废、中间没有经过文明阶段的社会。 ?。

remMethod.val: de(=down) + cad(落) + ence → 往下落 → 衰落， 颓废

trans.tranOther: behaviour that shows that someone has low moral standards and is more concerned with pleasure than serious matters
